events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The reported issue has been categorized under the Refund cluster based on customer's request.
An agent from the refunds team has been assigned to this case to assist the customer promptly.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the issue with your order. Iâ€™m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can proceed with your refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and I have attached a photo showing the item I got instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will process a full refund to your original payment method and you can keep the incorrect item.
That sounds good to me, I appreciate your quick help with this and the option to keep the wrong item.
Your refund has been successfully issued, and you should see the amount credited within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and if everything is now satisfactory with your order.
We are closing this case as the refund has been completed and no further issues were reported by the customer.
